comments.body: This entire trait is dead code. I've submitted a PR to Scala.js to remove there as well. (https://github.com/scala-js/scala-js/pull/4118)

diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,30 @@
+package scala.scalanative
+package junit.plugin
+
+// Ported from Scala.js
+
+import scala.tools.nsc._
+
+/** Hacks to have our source code compatible with all the versions of scalac
+ *  that we support.
+ *
+ *  @author Nicolas Stucki
+ */
+trait CompatComponent {
